name: UIApplication delegate applicationDidEnterBackground: must delete sensitive data (Objective-C)
description: To avoid any sensitive data getting captured, use the UIApplication delegate method applicationDidEnterBackground: to clean up the data before your application is going in background mode.
output:
Associated to each violation, the following information is provided:
- The number of violation occurrences
- Bookmarks for violation occurrences found in the source code
rationale: Ensure your sensitive data are deleted in UIApplication delegate method applicationDidEnterBackground: which is called when going to background mode
alternativeName: Ensure you have clean up data when applicationDidEnterBackground is called as delegate method
